document.full_text: yemeni protesters demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's rule blamed him on tuesday for bloodshed that has raised u.s. fears of chaos, even as indirect talks to resolve the crisis got under way.
document.title: yemenis fume over bloodshed, indirect talks start
lines_and_colors: yemeni protesters demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's rule blamed him on tuesday for bloodshed that has raised u.s. fears of chaos, even as indirect talks to resolve the crisis got under way.
